name: Kazan v. Wilkes-Barre Railway Corporation, Appellant

judges: Before Maxey, C. J.; Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Parker and Stearns, JJ.
parties: Kazan v. Wilkes-Barre Railway Corporation, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment entered by the Superior Court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Baldrige of that court.

attorneys: Frank P. Slattery, with him Ben B. Jones, Jr., and Paul Bedford, for appellant.
Thomas M. Lewis, with him Max Bosenn, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Kazan v. Wilkes-Barre Railway Corporation, Appellant.
Argued April 13, 1943.
Before Maxey, C. J.; Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Parker and Stearns, JJ.
Frank P. Slattery, with him Ben B. Jones, Jr., and Paul Bedford, for appellant.
Thomas M. Lewis, with him Max Bosenn, for appellee.
May 10, 1943:
